verses.text: \w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* escaped \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* ordered \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Records|strong="H1697"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Chronicles|strong="H1697"\w*,\f + \fr 6:1 \ft Or the Book of Memorials, the Annals or the Book of Records of Historical Events\f* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* exposed Bigthana \f + \fr 6:2 \ft Bigthana is a variant of Bigthan; see Esther 2:21.\f* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Teresh|strong="H8657"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w who|strong="H8104"\w* \w guarded|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s entrance, \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* conspired \w to|strong="H7971"\w* assassinate \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* inquired, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w dignity|strong="H1420"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w bestowed|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w act|strong="H6213"\w*?” “\w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*,” replied \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w attendants|strong="H5288"\w*.

“\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*?” \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* asked. \w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* just entered \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w outer|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w ask|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w attendants|strong="H5288"\w* answered \w him|strong="H5975"\w*, “\w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w*, \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.” “Bring \w him|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w*,” ordered \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* entered, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H3820"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w*?” \w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w thought|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w*, “\w Whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* told \w the|strong="H2001"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w For|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2001"\w* man whom \w the|strong="H2001"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w*,

\w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* himself \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w worn|strong="H3847"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* himself \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w ridden|strong="H7392"\w*—\w one|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* crest \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w entrusted|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w most|strong="H4428"\w* \w noble|strong="H6579"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*. \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w array|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* wants \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* parade \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w square|strong="H7339"\w*, \w proclaiming|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, ‘\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w*!’”

“\w Hurry|strong="H4116"\w*,” \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, “\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w proposed|strong="H1697"\w*. \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w neglect|strong="H5307"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* suggested.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w arrayed|strong="H3847"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* paraded \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w through|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w square|strong="H7339"\w*, \w crying|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*. \w But|strong="H7725"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* rushed \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w covered|strong="H2645"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* grief.

\w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w happened|strong="H7136"\w*. \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w advisers|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* said \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w downfall|strong="H5307"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w begun|strong="H2490"\w*, \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jewish|strong="H3064"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*—\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.”

\w While|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w arrived|strong="H5060"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* rushed \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* Esther \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w*.
